channel.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
channel.description: But simply notify the target that they are linked with a converted Mystic. This way the evil faction can conspire at night with Evil King, Sorcerer, or Neutrals.

item.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Why?

Read full topic

item.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Illusionist linked them.
Oh hi. Well you’re converted. F**k you.
EDIT: Language! OwO
Also. This shows that any drunk, butler, cw will be confirmed because the illusionist has shown themselves. So… no.

Read full topic

item.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
You got to be more specific. Do you mean apostle or illusionist or both? Don’t just say let them keep their abilities it does not help the situation you have to give solutions to the problem at hand to fix the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds

item.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
From what I’ve heard, Illusionist used to have Link Minds. But then no one would claim to the Psychic, so it was removed.

Read full topic
item.source: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds

item.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Now.
I am not claiming to someone who can be converted.

Future
I am not claiming to you. For who knows? You can be an illusionist.

Read full topic

item.title: Let converted Mystic keep Link Minds
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Firelitten:

Mental link is still useless…
If the prince asks you to link him.

If the Prince asks you to link him, you are still screwed whether this change is implemented or not.

You don’t know who is evil
That’s the problem l!

Sometimes you do.
